name: A. Mashmokh and Lights
statement:
Mashmokh works in a factory. At the end of each day he must turn off all
of the lights. The lights on the factory are indexed from to . There are
buttons in Mashmokh’s room indexed from to as well. If Mashmokh pushes
button with index , then each light with index not less than that is
still turned on turns off.Mashmokh is not very clever. So instead of
pushing the first button he pushes some of the buttons randomly each
night. He pushed distinct buttons (the buttons were pushed consecutively
in the given order) this night. Now he wants to know for each light the
index of the button that turned this light off. Please note that the
index of button is actually , not .Please, help Mashmokh, print these
indices.
